related_questions.question: Contoh recount teks tentang stady tour di jakarta

answers.answer: Saya hanya memberikan langkah pentingnya saja. Sebenarnya mudah untuk membuat recoun text. Topiknya kan, tentang study tour, coba cari informasi sejelas-jelasnya tentang study tour. Lalu, kembangkan menjadi sebuah recount teks. Pakai bahasa indonesia dulu. Setelah ditata rapi dengan bahasa indonesia yang baik dan literer, diubah ke dalam bahasa inggris. Okay ? @Liwed

Aku kasih caranya aja ya. Pertama rangkai kejadian study tour kamu dari awal sampai akhir kemudian translate kan ke bahasa inggris, karena inti dari recount text itu menulis dan mengarang kejadian yang memang pernah terjadi dan kita alami
shawty itu bahasa slang-nya bhs inggris yang artinya cantik,menarik.

related_questions.question: Buatlah dialog dengan menggunakan ungkapan expression love and sadness beserta situasinya

answers.answer:
Me    : Mom, i should tell you right now
Mom : What is it dear ? tell me right now
Me    : I should go to australia mom, i get that schollarship from school
Mom : Are you kidding me ?
 Me  : No mom, i’m seriously this is a special chance for me to catch my dream would you like to          let me go ?
 mom : But i love you dear how can i let you go ?
me   : Calmdown mom everythings gonna be alright
mom : But , i’m afraid if i’ll miss you my daughter i feel so sad  if i let you go
 me    : It’s ok mom, you can call me or message me distance is not a big problem
 mom : If that’s you want i’ll let you go, but you must take care there
 me    : Sure mom  wish me luck
mom : Sure dear

Situation : Your friend is sad.

Ana : Are you okay? You look so sad.
Nia : No, I'm not okay. I feel so sad because I had a fight with my brother yesterday.
Ana : Why?
Nia : He took my favorite novel without asking my permission and he ripped it! How can I not sad? He even not sorry at all and when I yelled at him, he yelled me back with his ridiculous reason that why should I got sad over a novel!
Ana : You must be really hurt...
Nia : Of couse I do.
Ana : What should I do to cheer you up?
Nia : Thanks for your attention but no, sorry.
Ana : Really? I'm sorry I can't help you much.
Nia: Yeah, thanks.

bold: expressions
italic: responses
if conditional sentences? beda tenses-nya, sama fact-nya

Type 1 = Real / Present Conditional (terjadi sekarang)
Form = If + S + V1..., I + will + V1...
Example = If I have money, I will treat you
Meaning = it may/ may not happen. Jadi artinya bisa terjadi atau tidak.

Type 2 = Contrary to the present fact (bertentangan sama yang terjadi pada kenyataan)
Form = If + S + V2..., I + would + V1...
Example =
a. If I had money, I would treat you
b. If I were you, I would leave him
Meaning =
a1. I don't have money, so I dont treat you, or
a2. I don't treat you, because I don't have money
b. I'm not you, so I don't leave him
(intinya kalau conditional 2, penyataan dalam v2, arti dalam v1)

Type 3
Form = If + S + had + V3..., I + would + have + V3...
Example =
a. If I had had money, I would have treated you
b. If my father had got marred again, my mother would have killed him
Meaning =
a. I didn't have money, so I didn't treat you
b. My father didn't get married again, so my mother didn't kill him
(intinya kalau conditional 3, penyataan dalam v3, arti dalam v2)

related_questions.question: Pengertian dan contoh adverb of frequency

answers.answer: adverb yang menggambarkan frekuensi seseorang melakukan suatu pekerjaan, misalnya setiap hari, atau beberapa kali dalam 1 bulan
pengertian : kata keterangan yang menyatakan seberapa sering suatu kegiatan yang dilakukan.
